actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Budgeting and Accounting Act, 1921, to affirm the authority of the Comptroller General to have access to any books, documents, papers, or records of the Department of Justice for managerial and operational as well as for fiscal reviews and evaluations.

summary.text: States that the authority of the Comptroller General to have access to documents and other materials upon request under the Budgeting and Accounting Act, 1921, shall not be limited, with respect to the Department of Justice, to materials pertaining to the receipt and expenditure of public funds but shall extend to all such materials in the possession of the Department.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Budgeting and Accounting Act, 1921, to affirm the authority of the Comptroller General to have access to any books, documents, papers, or records of the Department of Justice for managerial and operational as well as for fiscal reviews and evaluations.
